GS40rasadhiu:463: tv imāḥ syuḥ pañca mṛttikāḥ Rsdhy_163*[62]d
GS40rasadhiu:536: na tu hīnaṃ na cādhikam Rsdhy_166*[65]d
GS40rasadhiu:853: yo jānāti na vakti saḥ Rsdhy_7b
GS40rasadhiu:912: vakti yo na sa jānāti Rsdhy_7a
GS40rasadhiu:1131: sṛṣṭyāmbujair nirodhāt taladvayaprāyo na khaṇḍaḥ syāt Rsdhy_112*2
GS40rasadhiu:1132: sṛṣṭyāṃ citaś chagaṇakaiḥ puṭito valī syāt Rsdhy_113b
GS40rasadhiu:1175: svedena dīnadīpto'sau grāsārthī jāyate sūtaḥ Rsdhy_116*2
